title: Fix your behavior bots
body: I was playing a game as olaf and I had 2 people flaming me the entire time so obviously I talked back and after the game you gave me a 10 game chat restriction when THEY LITERALLY FLAMED ME MORE AND ANNOYED ME THE WHOLE GAME. You guys seriously have to fix your behavior bots because I don't deserve a chat restriction, but they deserve a perm ban for their actions. And I bet you they do it every game and you people at riot do nothing to actually solve that problem. The bots should detect flame from them too and not just me because what I said was so true towards them and they flamed me even harder. Then they got everyone else to report me and then your bot went in and saw all the messages but doesn't even understand what happened. Just letting you all know their names were [REMOVED BY MODERATION-NO NAMING AND SHAMING ALLOWED]

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=PeinTheDuck,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nPj0L6dd,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-09-22T22:35:29.179+0000)
>
> so obviously I talked back

Why is that the "obvious" response? To some people, the obvious response would be to mute, focus on the game, and report afterward.
If you reported them, then their behavior will be reviewed. You are not guaranteed a feedback report though.
I left immediately and then I tried to report them and it wouldn't let me. Great client.
You might want to start a support ticket, but either way you should edit your post and remove those usernames. It's against the rules to name people in this forum.
I agree that reporting out if post game might be useful, but you can still submit a support ticket. Just mention you forgot ro report in post game lobby.

You flamed
You broke the rules
You got punished


Simple as that. 


Also naming and shaming is against the boards rules so either edit out their names or this post will be taken down by mods
Perpetuating toxic behavior is still toxic behavior. This isn't self defense, it is retaliation.
